author: Simon Difford
description: Big flavours combine harmoniously in this Manhattan riff which substitutes bitters for an amaro.
name: Longshoreman
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (perhaps over a chunk of block ice)
